title: I Agreed to Help a Friend Renovate His New Place & Fencer Reflex
itunes:title: I Agreed to Help a Friend Renovate His New Place & Fencer Reflex

description:
I agreed to help a friend renovate his new place and uncovered an unspeakable horror

***

Written by NS Lewis  and Narrated by Nate DuFort 

***

Fencer Reflex

***

Written by: Hy_Kwong and Narrated by: Cole Burkhardt

***

Content Warning: Animal Body Horror

***
